text: "Bad Company" is a 1974 song by British band Bad Company and is the title track to their debut studio album Bad Company. It was co-written by Paul Rodgers and Simon Kirke. ==Five Finger Death Punch cover== In 2010, Five Finger Death Punch covered Bad Company for their second studio album War Is the Answer. It has a heavier tone to it than the original. ===Track listing=== ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Bad Company songs Category:Five Finger Death Punch songs Category:Tori Amos songs Category:Garth Brooks songs Category:Hard rock songs
